desc: Planta Greenhouses offers the best Backyard and Commercial, Heavy Duty, Greenhouse kits for sale across the US . With Galvanized Steel frame and Polycarbonate walls, our greenhouses can withstand over 6 ft. of snow, 65 mph winds. With a 10 year warranty, you can see why we are North America's favorite greenhouse!

layout.text: Get your heavy-duty greenhouse kit from Planta.
